textAfterTable: Profile BlackRock Global Funds - Asian Dragon Fund is an open-end investment company incorporated in Luxembourg. The Fund's objective is to maximize capital appreciation. The Fund invests at least 70% of its total net assets in the equity securities of companies domiciled in, or exercising the predominant part of their economic activity in, Asia, excluding Japan.
